{"templates": {"default": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 5), size = (30, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (35, 5), size = (120, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 5), size = (190, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (355, 5), size = (400, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (760, 6), size = (100, 40), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (40, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 5), size = (30, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (35, 5), size = (120, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (160, 5), size = (190, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (355, 5), size = (400, 40), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (760, 6), size = (100, 40), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30), gFont("Regular", 26)], "itemHeight": 40 }
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
textsize = (textsize[0] + 60,textsize[1] + 60) offset = 30 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 80 wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 20,64) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))
